name: Iridescent Inscription Fragment
desc: A fragment of a shattered Iridescent Inscription. It is broken beyond repair and can no longer serve its purpose. Though dismissed by many as delusional obsession, some still believe they hold the key to unraveling messages from ancient civilizations.

value.text:
Completing select World Quests in Natlan
Luxurious Chest in Firethief's Secret Isle

customize.name: Iridescent Inscription Fragment
customize.desc: A fragment of a shattered Iridescent Inscription. It is broken beyond repair and can no longer serve its purpose. Though dismissed by many as delusional obsession, some still believe they hold the key to unraveling messages from ancient civilizations.

customize.text: in total. They can be given to Chuno in <color=#ece5d8>Basin of Unnumbered Flames</color> to obtain a Luxurious Chest and the achievement <color=#ffd780>Will This Really Work?</color> .

customize.name: Revelations from the Past
customize.desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.

customize.name: Peace to the Slumbering
customize.desc: The Greater Shadow Pin falls, opening a huge hole in the ground...

customize.name: Seeker No Finding
customize.desc: Search for the legendary "elixir that can cure all injuries" with Chikya.

customize.text: Luxurious Chest obtained completing the four challenges in <color=#ece5d8>Firethief's Secret Isle</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>
